TopicTitle: Squad engineers! A Kerbal keyring figure - can you make this a thing?

Articles.Content:
So, I was looking into getting the KSP plushie and tee combo on the website then I had a science moment: I would sacrifice copious amounts of Kerbals to have a mini Jeb dangling from my keyring.

Mayhaps have a Jeb one and a Valentina one to satisfy both tastes. What do people think?
and a normal kerbal one for people like me who think that the bug four are overrated

> 
> wat??

Probably something like this:

![oNJR0v7.png](http://i.imgur.com/oNJR0v7.png)

But less Photoshop image and more like tangible object.

Or just better Photoshoped, I'm no good at it.

> 
> Probably something like this:
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/oNJR0v7.png](http://i.imgur.com/oNJR0v7.png)
> 
> But less Photoshop image and more like tangible object.
> 
> Or just better Photoshoped, I'm no good at it.

Yes! Maybe if it had moveable (ragdoll) limbs, that would be perfect ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> 3d Print one, insert key ring ...

and I don't have access to a 3D printer, sadly
